channel.title: screaming-penguin.com
channel.description: Technology and software developer news and advocacy multi user weblog, with a decided Linux bent.

item.title: Meridian Mississippi Howard Johnsons
item.description: I know nobody gives a crap, and personally I hate worthless blog entries like this when I have to re. . .
item.content:encoded:
I know nobody gives a crap, and personally I hate worthless blog entries like this when I have to read them, but I just wanted to blog from Mississippi. Wireless at the HoJo, sitting by the heated atrium and pool while the kids swim. Sort of collecting blog entries from various places, now I have this one and Alcatraz, whoohoo, quite a collection.

No tech news to report from here, except that they have wireless net access in Mississippi. ;)
item.dc:creator: Charlie "atrox" Collins
